summary: Comprehensive testing of Admin Dashboard backend integration, Fact-check API, and Search empty state. All 28 backend API tests passed. All frontend admin pages (Operation Hub, Voice Management, Moderation Zone) display live data from backend APIs. Search page empty state shows styled NO_RESULTS_FOUND component.
critical_code_review_comments: All admin APIs return proper data structures with correct field types
Fact-check analyze endpoint is POST (not GET) - documented correctly
Admin pages auto-refresh every 30-60 seconds as specified
Voice Management shows 5 voices with LIVE/TRAINING status correctly
Moderation Zone shows 4 items with DISPUTED/VERIFIED/UNVERIFIED status
Search empty state displays styled NO_RESULTS_FOUND with action buttons

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all admin pages and search empty state working)

test_credentials: Guest mode: Click '[Oya, Play]' button on landing page. Admin: Click 'ADMIN' in sidebar
seed_data_creation: None - all data comes from backend APIs
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin dashboard fully tested. Key data-testids: operation-hub-page, voice-management-page, moderation-hub-page, search-page, search-input, moderation-card-{id}. All admin APIs working: /api/admin/metrics, /api/admin/alerts, /api/admin/streams, /api/admin/voices, /api/admin/moderation, /api/admin/stats. Fact-check APIs: /api/factcheck/{story_id} (GET), /api/factcheck/analyze (POST).

backend_admin_apis./api/admin/metrics: PASS - Returns active_streams, node_load, api_latency, storage_used, etc.
backend_admin_apis./api/admin/alerts: PASS - Returns 3 system alerts (warning, success, error types)
backend_admin_apis./api/admin/voices: PASS - Returns 5 voice metrics with LIVE/TRAINING status
backend_admin_apis./api/admin/stats: PASS - Returns queue stats with dubawa_status: CONNECTED

backend_factcheck_apis./api/factcheck/{story_id}: PASS - Returns verification status based on story_id hash
backend_factcheck_apis./api/factcheck/analyze: PASS - POST endpoint analyzes text for keywords (confirmed, disputed, rumor, false, etc.)

operation_hub.telemetry_bar: PASS - NODE_LOAD, API_LATENCY, UPTIME, ACTIVE_TRAFFIC displayed
operation_hub.system_alerts: PASS - 3 alerts displayed with correct icons and colors
operation_hub.signal_matrix: PASS - Stream table with LIVE/OFFLINE status

voice_management.voice_matrix: PASS - 5 voices displayed with name, language, latency, clarity, status
voice_management.voice_data: PASS - ATLAS_NEWS_V3, ECHO_BRIEF_XP, NOVA_ANCHOR, ONYX_REPORT, SHIMMER_CAST

search_empty_state.action_buttons: PASS - CLEAR_QUERY and BROWSE_DISCOVER buttons present

mocked_data_note: MOCKED: Dubawa fact-check API uses simulated responses (no public API available). Admin voice/stream data is realistic mock data from backend. All admin metrics are dynamic based on MongoDB collections.
